title: Sarvepalli Radhakrishnan
summary: Sarvepalli Radhakrishnan (Sarvepalli Radhakrishnayya;[2] pronunciation  5 September 1888 – 17 April 1975) was an Indian philosopher and statesman who served as the second president of India from 1962 to 1967.[3][web 1] Radhakrishnan was a great teacher, a remarkable philosopher, and a leader.[4]
